byline.original: By ROB HARRIS and AL BAKER

abstract: The police and the Queens district attorney, Richard A. Brown, announced the sweep against the operation, which they said took in $13 million: 75 were arrested, 21 are being sought and 15 are already in jail.
snippet: The police and the Queens district attorney, Richard A. Brown, announced the sweep against the operation, which they said took in $13 million: 75 were arrested, 21 are being sought and 15 are already in jail.
